app_details.title: Injector Origin
app_details.description: Injector Origin is more than just an injector app. Dive into our hero guides, packed with valuable tips and tricks to master every hero's abilities and strategies. Elevate your skills and enhance your gaming experience with Injector Origin now!

reviews.content: good but it's just the ads
reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that ads can be a bit annoying, but they help us keep the app free for everyone. We're always looking for ways to improve, so your input is valuable. If you have any other suggestions, feel free to share!

reviews.content: ganda ng skin ni chou thank you
reviews.replyContent: Glad you like Chou's skin! Thanks for your support! If you have any other feedback, feel free to share. Enjoy the game!

reviews.content: Probably one of the best injector.But When i upgrade the skin Yasha to Infernal Wrymlord Its Shows Doom Incarnate the icon of the skin visual's and Voice lines just basically all of it just show's doom incarnate no Infernal Wrymlord just Doom Incarnate And also the icon says Yui Script
reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! The issue with the Yasha skin upgrade has been fixed. Everything should display correctly now. If you notice anything else, feel free to let us know. We appreciate your support!

reviews.content: This gives me a 5 star rating tho lesley's upgradable skin in her cheergunner is not as wide as the othere skin replacement this is the best injector out there! It even shows you the skill descriptions and purposes i love this injector so much! Hoping they will add many variations of skin to skin to choose from. Also the creators of this app is responsive! Tysm for responding ASAP and also fixing the request we face tysm!
reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the 5-star rating! We're glad you're enjoying the app and appreciate your feedback on Lesley’s Cheergunner skin. We're working on adding more skin variations and improving the current ones. Thanks for your support and for highlighting our responsiveness—your feedback helps us get better!
